text: Merriam-Webster, Inc., is an American company that publishes reference books. It is especially known for its dictionaries. ==History== In 1831, George and Charles Merriam founded the company as G & C Merriam Co. in Springfield, Massachusetts. In 1964, Encyclop√¶dia Britannica, Inc., bought Merriam-Webster, Inc., as a subsidiary. The company created its current name in 1982. ==References== Category:Companies based in Massachusetts Category:1831 establishments in the United States
title: Merriam-Webster
